definition: Mathematical or geometric properties that define position, shape, or dimension in space

positive_examples: The GPS coordinates showed our exact location at 40.7589° N, 73.9851° W.
Draw a straight line connecting these two points on the map.
The airplane's flight path created a perfect arc across the sky.
We measured the perimeter of the rectangular garden plot.
The intersection of Broadway and 42nd Street forms a geometric angle.
Scientists plotted the satellite's orbital plane around Earth.
negative_examples: The neighborhood has a strong sense of community.
Sales increased in the northeastern region this quarter.
The storm system covered a large area of the midwest.
We reserved a table in the restaurant's outdoor section.
The wildlife preserve spans thousands of acres.
Our company operates in the European market.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: GeographicArea, Territory, Zone, District, Sector
